issue.title: [R] Update messaging in installation scripts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14849](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14849). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When building from source, add a message to say something like "\*\*\* For a faster installation, set the environment variable LIBARROW_BINARY=true before installing"

When building from source, add a message to say something about the fact that not all features are enabled and that you should set LIBARROW_MINIMAL=false and reinstall if you need them.
